name: ChefBot2000
description:
🎮 This is a small game we made for a small Game Jam in a small Discord channel! 🎮 

⭐ Udev Game Jam submission ⭐

Made by BusyMen Team:

- Kan (Technical Consultant) -

- Marin (Game Designer, Tester) -

- Miaan (Game Developer, Artist, Composer) -

- Sam (Game Developer) -

Background in Main Menu is from Twitter: @WoostarsPixels

Currently, we only support Vietnamese. English is on the go!

INSTRUCTION:

WASD or ⬆️⬅️⬇️➡️: Move

R: Rewind All Steps

U: Undo One Step

Move all the boxes into the goals! Just that!
